title: Duality of Sp(2N) and SO(N) Supersymmetric Gauge Theories with Adjoint Matter
abstract:
We discuss electric-magnetic duality in two new classes of supersymmetric Yang-Mills theories. The models have gauge group $Sp(2
c)$ or $SO(
c)$ with matter in both the adjoint and defining representations. By perturbing these theories with various superpotentials, we find a variety of new infrared fixed points with dual descriptions. This work is complementary to that of Kutasov and Schwimmer on $SU(
c)$ and of Intriligator on other models involving $Sp(2
c)$ and $SO(
c)$.
